content.question: The position of an object attached to a spring is given by <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>y</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo> <mi>t</mi> <mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac> <mn>1</mn> <mn>6</mn> </mfrac> <mi>cos</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo> <mrow> <mn>5</mn><mi>t</mi></mrow> <mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>âˆ’</mo><mfrac> <mn>1</mn> <mn>4</mn> </mfrac> <mi>sin</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo> <mrow> <mn>5</mn><mi>t</mi></mrow> <mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaWG5bWaaeWaa8aabaWdbiaadshaaiaawIcacaGLPaaacqGH9aqp daWcaaWdaeaapeGaaGymaaWdaeaapeGaaGOnaaaaciGGJbGaai4Bai aacohadaqadaWdaeaapeGaaGynaiaadshaaiaawIcacaGLPaaacqGH sisldaWcaaWdaeaapeGaaGymaaWdaeaapeGaaGinaaaaciGGZbGaai yAaiaac6gadaqadaWdaeaapeGaaGynaiaadshaaiaawIcacaGLPaaa aaa@4BA3@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>, where t is time in seconds.
